job_tasks.phrase: vertalen van wensen naar hoogwaardige oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the requirements from stakeholders (Marketing & Communication) and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: externe koppeling moet opzetten en inrichten
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and configuring external integrations implies dealing with data flow and connection between systems.
The core role is explicitly stated as a developer.

job_tasks.phrase: verder ontwikkelen en vormgeven van ons Drupal CMS
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ongoing development and shaping of the CMS, which is a software development task.
Implementing custom features using PHP is a direct software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: meewerkt aan de front-end in javascript
job_tasks.justification: Working on the front-end with JavaScript is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: beheer je ook het platform waar Drupal op draait
job_tasks.justification: Managing the platform Drupal runs on involves backend system management, which is part of software development.
The overall goal of improving the website implies building and developing web applications.

job_tasks.phrase: beheer je ook het platform waar Drupal op draait
job_tasks.justification: Managing the platform where Drupal runs can extend into operational aspects of keeping the system running, which aligns with operations engineering.
Ensuring the platform is manageable implies operational considerations for its maintenance and stability.

job_tasks.phrase: onderzoeken we hoe generatieve AI onze redacteuren kan ondersteunen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions investigating generative AI, which falls under modeling in the context of GenAI.

soft_skills.phrase: samen met je collega ontwikkelaars en met collega's binnen team Applications
samen met de product owner en functioneel beheerders
Met onze dagelijkse scrum stand-up houden we overzicht
uitdaging om samen te werken met verschillende disciplines
vertalen van wensen naar hoogwaardige oplossingen
passende oplossing binnen het Drupal CMS
verbeteren van de prestaties van de website
Naast innovatie zorg je voor een goed beheersbaar platform

classification.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on PHP development and Drupal CMS management, with only a minor mention of investigating generative AI. The core responsibilities and technologies are traditional software development, not specialized GenAI engineering. Therefore, it does not fit the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
